word: MRS. PARMELIA LANE WAS THE WIFE OF ELDER SANDS LANE, WHO WAS A NATIVE OF MICHIGAN AND A SUCCESSFUL PREACHER. LATER HE BECAME PRESIDENT OF SEVERAL CONFERENCES IN THE UNITED STATES. HE WAS CONDUCTING A TENT MEETING IN RISELEY WHEN MRS. WHITE ARRIVED IN ENGLAND. SHE AND THE LANE FAMILY WERE GOOD FRIENDS THROUGH THE YEARS.
